description: Historical Asset Class Returns for True Mathematical Accuracy
dataSource: Multiple sources: FRED Economic Data, Yahoo Finance, Morningstar, REIT indices
methodology: Replace approximations with actual historical performance data

notes.spyReturns: S&P 500 total returns including dividends from SPDR S&P 500 ETF
notes.bondReturns: US Aggregate Bond total returns from iShares Core US Aggregate Bond ETF
notes.intlReturns: International developed markets from Vanguard Total International Stock Index
notes.realEstateReturns: REIT returns from Vanguard Real Estate Index Fund
notes.commodityReturns: Commodity returns from DJP commodities index
notes.cashReturns: 3-month Treasury bill rates from FRED Economic Data
notes.inflationRates: Consumer Price Index from Bureau of Labor Statistics

individualStockPremiums.description: Individual stock returns vs market - statistical premiums/discounts
individualStockPremiums.methodology: Based on academic research on single-stock volatility and returns
individualStockPremiums.notes: Individual stocks typically have 2-3x market volatility with varying risk premiums

cashEquivalents.description: Cash return models based on actual interest rate environments
